CAT Exam.posts_classes_courses_departments_academ: MBA/PGDM programs in IIMs and other top B-Schools.
CAT Exam.eligibility_education_course: Bachelor's degree (minimum 3 years) or professional degree (CA/CS/ICWA).
CAT Exam.eligibility_course_year: Passed or appearing in final year (results to be submitted by a specified deadline).

exam_subjects.Interview: N/A  , GE/PI are part of institute admissions

CAT Exam.conducting_body: Rotationally by one of the Indian Institutes of Management (IIMs)

CMAT Exam.eligibility_course_year: Passed or appearing in final year.

exam_subjects.Paper 1: Quantitative Techniques & Data Interpretation, Logical Reasoning, Language Comprehension, General Awareness, Innovation & Entrepreneurship
exam_subjects.Interview: N/A  , GE/PI are part of institute admissions

MAH MBA CET.posts_classes_courses_departments_academ: MBA/MMS programs in institutes in Maharashtra.
MAH MBA CET.domicile: Maharashtra (for State Quota) / PAN INDIA (for All-India Quota)
MAH MBA CET.eligibility_course_year: Passed or appearing in final year/semester.

exam_subjects.Paper 1: Logical Reasoning, Abstract Reasoning, Quantitative Aptitude, Verbal Ability & Reading Comprehension
exam_subjects.Interview: N/A  , GE/PI are part of institute admissions

MAH MBA CET.conducting_body: State Common Entrance Test Cell, Maharashtra

XAT Exam.posts_classes_courses_departments_academ: Admission to XLRI and XAT Associate Member Institutes.
XAT Exam.eligibility_course_year: Passed or appearing in final year (degree to be completed by specified date).

exam_subjects.Paper 1: Verbal and Logical Ability, Decision Making, Quantitative Ability & Data Interpretation, General Knowledge

exam_subjects.Paper 1: Analysis of Business Situations, Reading Comprehension, Quantitative Ability, Data Sufficiency, English Usage

PGDBA Exam.posts_classes_courses_departments_academ: Post Graduate Diploma in Business Analytics (joint IIM Calcutta, IIT Kharagpur, ISI Kolkata).

exam_subjects.Paper 1: Quantitative Aptitude, Logical Reasoning, Data Interpretation, Verbal Ability & English Comprehension

IIFT MBA Exam.posts_classes_courses_departments_academ: MBA (International Business/Business Analytics) at Indian Institute of Foreign Trade.

IIFT MBA Exam.eligibility_course_year: Passed or appearing in final year.

exam_subjects.Paper 1: CAT score (IIFT shortlists candidates based on CAT performance)
exam_subjects.eligibility: Candidates must have a valid CAT score
